definition: the act of expelling or projecting or ejecting
details:
noun
- the act of expelling or projecting or ejecting
= synonyms: expulsion
- the act of projecting out from something
= synonyms: protrusion, jut, jutting
- any structure that branches out from a central support
- the representation of a figure or solid on a plane as it would look from a particular direction
- a prediction made by extrapolating from past observations
- a planned undertaking
= synonyms: project
- the projection of an image from a film onto a screen
- the acoustic phenomenon that gives sound a penetrating quality
= example: the acoustic phenomenon that gives sound a penetrating quality
= synonyms: acoustic projection, sound projection
- (psychiatry) a defense mechanism by which your own traits and emotions are attributed to someone else
- any solid convex shape that juts out from something
